## Load the dataset

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- readr::read_csv("data/raw/example.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
glimpse(df)

```

```{r}
df %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = x1, y = x2, color = factor(y))) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
  labs(color = "y")
```
